source: spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS SteamDB")

class SetupBronzeHelper():
    def __init__(self):
        self.initialized = True
        self.bronze = "abfss://steam-game-project@dataprojectsforhuilu.dfs.core.windows.net/medallion/bronze"
        self.silver = "abfss://steam-game-project@dataprojectsforhuilu.dfs.core.windows.net/medallion/silver"
        self.gold = "abfss://steam-game-project@dataprojectsforhuilu.dfs.core.windows.net/medallion/gold"


    def create_steam_game_bz(self):
        if(self.initialized):
            print(f"Creating steam_game_bz table...", end='')
            spark.sql(f'''CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS steam_game_bz(
                appid integer,
                name string,
                release_year integer,
                release_date string,
                genres string,
                categories string,
                price double,
                recommendations integer,
                developer string,
                publisher string,
                load_time timestamp,
                source_file string
                )
                USING DELTA
                LOCATION '{self.bronze}/steam_game_bz/'
            ''')
            print("Done")
        else:
            raise ReferenceError("Application database is not defined. Cannot create table in default database.")
    

 
    def setup(self):
        import time
        start = int(time.time())
        print(f"\nStarting setup ...")
        self.create_steam_game_bz()
        print(f"Setup completed in {int(time.time()) - start} seconds")

    def validate(self):
        import time
        start = int(time.time())
        print(f"\nStarting setup validation ...")
        self.assert_table("steam_game_bz")
        print(f"Setup validation completed in {int(time.time()) - start} seconds")

    def assert_table(self, table_name):
        assert spark.sql(f"SHOW TABLES") \
            .filter(f"isTemporary == false and tableName == '{table_name}'") \
            .count() == 1, f"The table {table_name} is missing"
        print(f"Found {table_name} table: Success")

    def cleanup(self):
        tables = spark.catalog.listTables("SteamDB")
        print(f"Deleting Tables...", end='')
        for table in tables:
            spark.sql(f"DROP TABLE IF EXISTS SteamDB.{table.name}")
        print("Done")

        print(f"Deleting Bronze Folder...", end='')
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(self.bronze + '/', True)
        print("Done")

        print(f"Deleting Silver Folder...", end='')
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(self.silver + '/', True)
        print("Done")
       
        print(f"Deleting Gold Folder...", end='')
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(self.gold + '/', True)
        print("Done")

class SetupGoldHelper():
    def __init__(self):
        self.initialized = True
        self.gold = "abfss://steam-game-project@dataprojectsforhuilu.dfs.core.windows.net/medallion/gold"

    def create_fact_steam_games_gl(self):
        if(self.initialized):
            print(f"Creating fact_steam_games_gl table...", end='')
            spark.sql(f'''CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fact_steam_games_gl(
                appid integer,
                name string,
                release_year integer,
                release_date date,
                price double,
                recommendations integer,
                update_time timestamp
                )
                USING DELTA
                LOCATION '{self.gold}/fact_steam_games_gl/'
            ''')
            print("Done")
        else:
            raise ReferenceError("Application database is not defined. Cannot create table in default database.")

    def create_dim_genres_gl(self):
        if(self.initialized):
            print(f"Creating dim_genres_gl table...", end='')
            spark.sql(f'''CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dim_genres_gl(
                appid integer,
                genre string,
                update_time timestamp
                )
                USING DELTA
                LOCATION '{self.gold}/dim_genres_gl/'
            ''')
            print("Done")
        else:
            raise ReferenceError("Application database is not defined. Cannot create table in default database.")
   
    def create_dim_categories_gl(self):
        if(self.initialized):
            print(f"Creating dim_categories_gl table...", end='')
            spark.sql(f'''CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dim_categories_gl(
                appid integer,
                category string,
                update_time timestamp
                )
                USING DELTA
                LOCATION '{self.gold}/dim_categories_gl/'
            ''')
            print("Done")
        else:
            raise ReferenceError("Application database is not defined. Cannot create table in default database.")

    def create_dim_developers_gl(self):
        if(self.initialized):
            print(f"Creating dim_developers_gl table...", end='')
            spark.sql(f'''CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dim_developers_gl(
                appid integer,
                developer string,
                update_time timestamp
                )
                USING DELTA
                LOCATION '{self.gold}/dim_developers_gl/'
            ''')
            print("Done")
        else:
            raise ReferenceError("Application database is not defined. Cannot create table in default database.")

    def create_dim_publishers_gl(self):
        if(self.initialized):
            print(f"Creating dim_publishers_gl table...", end='')
            spark.sql(f'''CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dim_publishers_gl(
                appid integer,
                publisher string,
                update_time timestamp
                )
                USING DELTA
                LOCATION '{self.gold}/dim_publishers_gl/'
            ''')
            print("Done")
        else:
            raise ReferenceError("Application database is not defined. Cannot create table in default database.")


    def setup(self):
        import time
        start = int(time.time())
        print(f"\nStarting setup ...")
        self.create_fact_steam_games_gl()
        self.create_dim_genres_gl()
        self.create_dim_categories_gl()
        self.create_dim_developers_gl()
        self.create_dim_publishers_gl()
        print(f"Setup completed in {int(time.time()) - start} seconds")

    def validate(self):
        import time
        start = int(time.time())
        print(f"\nStarting setup validation ...")
        self.assert_table("fact_steam_games_gl")
        self.assert_table("dim_genres_gl")
        self.assert_table("dim_categories_gl")
        self.assert_table("dim_developers_gl")
        self.assert_table("dim_publishers_gl")
        print(f"Setup validation completed in {int(time.time()) - start} seconds")

    def assert_table(self, table_name):
        assert spark.sql(f"SHOW TABLES") \
            .filter(f"isTemporary == false and tableName == '{table_name}'") \
            .count() == 1, f"The table {table_name} is missing"
        print(f"Found {table_name} table: Success")
